name: Spectral Shift (Option 2 Games, GrantW)
description:
Spectral Shift if a 2D puzzle platformer focused on color. By shifting what spectrum of light you can interact with, you can activated doors, discover hidden platforms, and avoid dangerous spikes!

This game was built in 72 hours for Deynum Studio's "The Completion Jam". With a theme of "out of place", our game approaches this in a few ways. You move reflectors that are out of place to open doors, you switch spectrums to disable out of place platforms, and you move out of place color changers to manipulate the color of lasers. Sometimes, you are in the wrong spectrum to solve the puzzle and is what is out of place.

 Made with 100% original code, art, and music.
